languages.text: "О Азуриан, почему провидцы так поступили? Не только мон-кай повинны в гибели нашего дома! Наши собственные правители обрекли на страдания тысячи бесценных душ! Я... я..."
"Oh, Asuryan, why would the Farseers do this? The mon-keigh are not the only ones to blame for the death of our home! Our own leaders condemned thousands of precious souls to suffering! I... I..."
languages.original_text: "О Азуриан, почему провидцы так поступили? Не только мон-кай повинны в гибели нашего дома! Наши собственные правители обрекли на страдания тысячи бесценных душ! Я... я..."

languages.text: “噢，阿苏焉在上，那些先知为什么要这么做？我们的家园遭到了毁灭，可那些猴子绝不是唯一的罪人！是我们自己的领袖，让成千上万的宝贵灵魂遭到了无穷无尽的苦难！我……我……”
languages.original_text: "Oh, Asuryan, why would the Farseers do this? The mon-keigh are not the only ones to blame for the death of our home! Our own leaders condemned thousands of precious souls to suffering! I... I..."

traits.locale_text: “噢，阿苏焉在上，那些先知为什么要这么做？我们的家园遭到了毁灭，可那些猴子绝不是唯一的罪人！是我们自己的领袖，让成千上万的宝贵灵魂遭到了无穷无尽的苦难！我……我……”

languages.text: 「ああ、アシュリアンよ、なぜ先見司はこのようなことを？我らの故郷の死はモン＝ケイだけのせいではない！我らのリーダーが大切な何千もの魂を苦痛へと追いやったのだ！我…我は…」
languages.original_text: "Oh, Asuryan, why would the Farseers do this? The mon-keigh are not the only ones to blame for the death of our home! Our own leaders condemned thousands of precious souls to suffering! I... I..."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、アシュリアンよ、なぜ先見司はこのようなことを？我らの故郷の死はモン＝ケイだけのせいではない！我らのリーダーが大切な何千もの魂を苦痛へと追いやったのだ！我…我は…」

languages.text: « Oh, Asuryan, pourquoi les Grands Prophètes feraient-ils ça ? Les mon-keigh ne sont pas les seuls responsables de la mort de notre foyer ! Nos propres chefs ont condamné des milliers d'âmes précieuses à la souffrance ! Je... Je... »
languages.original_text: "Oh, Asuryan, why would the Farseers do this? The mon-keigh are not the only ones to blame for the death of our home! Our own leaders condemned thousands of precious souls to suffering! I... I..."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, Asuryan, pourquoi les Grands Prophètes feraient-ils ça ? Les mon-keigh ne sont pas les seuls responsables de la mort de notre foyer ! Nos propres chefs ont condamné des milliers d'âmes précieuses à la souffrance ! Je... Je... »

languages.text: «Oh, Asuryan, ¿por qué hacen esto los Videntes? ¡Los mon-keigh no son los únicos culpables de que perdiéramos nuestro hogar! ¡Nuestros líderes hacen sufrir a miles de preciadas almas! Yo... yo...».
languages.original_text: "Oh, Asuryan, why would the Farseers do this? The mon-keigh are not the only ones to blame for the death of our home! Our own leaders condemned thousands of precious souls to suffering! I... I..."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, Asuryan, ¿por qué hacen esto los Videntes? ¡Los mon-keigh no son los únicos culpables de que perdiéramos nuestro hogar! ¡Nuestros líderes hacen sufrir a miles de preciadas almas! Yo... yo...».

languages.text: "O Asuryan, warum haben die Runenpropheten das getan? Die Chem-Pan-Sey sind nicht die als Einzige schuld am Tod unserer Heimat! Unsere eigenen Anführer haben Tausende wertvoller Seelen zum Leid verdammt! Ich ... ich ..."
languages.original_text: "Oh, Asuryan, why would the Farseers do this? The mon-keigh are not the only ones to blame for the death of our home! Our own leaders condemned thousands of precious souls to suffering! I... I..."

traits.locale_text: "O Asuryan, warum haben die Runenpropheten das getan? Die Chem-Pan-Sey sind nicht die als Einzige schuld am Tod unserer Heimat! Unsere eigenen Anführer haben Tausende wertvoller Seelen zum Leid verdammt! Ich ... ich ..."

languages.text: "Asuryan... Ötesezenler neden bunu yapsın? Yuvamızın yıkılmasında tek suçlu mon-keighler değil ki! Bizim kendi önderlerimiz, binlerce kıymetli ruhu eziyete mahkûm etti! Ben... Ben..."
languages.original_text: "Oh, Asuryan, why would the Farseers do this? The mon-keigh are not the only ones to blame for the death of our home! Our own leaders condemned thousands of precious souls to suffering! I... I..."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, Asuryan... Ötesezenler neden bunu yapsın? Yuvamızın yıkılmasında tek suçlu mon-keighler değil ki! Bizim kendi önderlerimiz binlerce kıymetli ruhu eziyet çekmeye mahkûm etti! Ben... Ben..."
